DomainsPage.notSignedIn: You are not signed in. Please sign in to access this page.
DomainsPage.title: Title

RegisterPage.contactMessage: If you have any questions, please contact us at

details.apiSecret: This is like a password which will be used to make changes to the website, e.g. to enter carbs, to upload glucose values through xDrip or to update the profile (basal rates, glucose targets, etc). Keep this password safe. This field must be at least 12 characters long, it can contain capital letters, small letters, digits, dash, underline or dot
details.emailValidationCode: Fill in the validation code you received by email. Open your inbox, check it for the email you received from this website, copy the validation code and paste it in this field. We need this code in order to make sure that the email add-resss you entered earlier is indeed yours
details.ownerEmail: Your e-mail address. It has to be a real e-mail address you have access to. We will send a confirmation code to this address to verify that it is yours, so it is impoertant to be careful when filling it in
details.ownerName: The name of the Nightscout website owner, preferrably the one by which the administrators could find you on Facebook or other social media platforms in case we need to contact you
details.subDomain: Subdomain is the first part of your Nightscout website. e.g. if you enter john, your Nightscout website will be john.nsromania.info , this name has to be unique, e.g. maria is already taken. You can only small letters, digits and dashes when filling it in. an example would be my-bg , then the website will be my-bd.nsromania.info
details.title: Site title. This title will be displayed on the Nightscout page header. Usually people use the firstname of the person monitored by the website. Or you can just leave this as-is, then "Nightscout" will be displayed

formValidation.apiSecretHelperText: API secrte must be at least 12 characters long, it can contain capital letters, small letters, digits, dash, underline or dot

RegisterPage.ownerNameAndEmailRequired: Name and email have to be filled in to proceed further
RegisterPage.registrationDescription: Please fill in this form in order to request creation of a Nightscout site on NSRomania.info. Once the form is filled in, it will be reviewed and potentially approved by the administration team. Once this happens, you will receive an email and a Nightscout swebsite will be created on your behalf
RegisterPage.registrationFailed: Registration failed, please check your data
RegisterPage.registrationHint: If you are not sure what each field means, please click on the <icon></icon> icon and it will provide you with additional help
RegisterPage.registrationPrompt: If you still want to register, please fill in
RegisterPage.sendingValidationEmail: Sending validation email, please check our inbox and spam folders
RegisterPage.title: Site title

RegistrationSuccessPage.registrationSuccessMessage: You have successfully registered. The administrator will review your registration and approve it shortly. You will receive an email notification once your registration is approved.

RequestsPage.welcomeMessage: Here are the registration request, please be minful when evaluating

WelcomePage.contactMessage: If you have any questions, please contact us at
WelcomePage.welcomeMessage1: This is a community-driven Nightscout hosting service.
WelcomePage.welcomeMessage2: This service is offered for caretakers of people with type 1 diabetes.
WelcomePage.welcomeMessage3: This is a community server managed by volunteers.
WelcomePage.welcomeMessage4: Please use it with care and respect.
